required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Correlation of PD-L1 Expression in Non-small Lung Cancer Tissue and Peripheral Blood T Cell and Serum.
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Research for the Correlation of PD-L1 Expression in Non-small Lung Cancer Tissue and Peripheral Blood T Cell and Serum.

brief_summary.textblock: The detection of tissue PD-L1 immunohistochemistry in Non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) has an important role in guiding for the treatment of immune detection point. At the same time,tissue detection is time-consuming and laborious, liquid biopsy can reflect the information of tumor tissue,PD-L1 expression in serum and peripheral blood T cell are expected to be simple, rapid, non-invasive means of detection. The project is planned to explore the correlation of PD-L1 expression in non-small lung cancer tissue and peripheral blood T cell and serum..The investigators have designed to detected the expression levels of PD-L1 protein in cancer tissue and detected the expression levels of PD-L1 in peripheral blood T cell and serum.By using variance analysis of repeated measures design information. Thus exploring the correlation of PD-L1 expression in non-small lung cancer tissue and peripheral blood T cell and serum,guiding clinical practice of immunotherapy.

primary_outcome.measure: The match rate of PD-L1 protein expression in non-small lung cancer tissue and peripheral blood T cell .
The match rate of PD-L1 protein expression in non-small lung cancer tissue and serum.

arm_group.description: The project is planned to explore the correlation of PD-L1 expression in non-small lung cancer tissue and peripheral blood T cell and serum.The investigators have designed to detected the expression levels of PD-L1 protein in cancer tissue and detected the expression levels of PD-L1 in peripheral blood T cell and serum by using variance analysis of repeated measures design information.

study_pop.textblock: Pathological histology and/or cytology confirmed non-small lung cancer

responsible_party.investigator_title: Deputy Director,Head of Oncology department, Principal Investigator, Clinical Professor
